title: openstack-api-image-create failing due to datetime parsing

comments.content:
Here are the tracebacks:


novaclient: http://paste.openstack.org/show/1008/

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris

comments.content: This would happen if image_meta.get('created_at') (or 'updated_at', or 'deleted_at') returns an empty string instead of None at _convert_timestamps_to_datetimes in nova/image/glance.py
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Looks like Glance rev84 might have introduced the use of empty strings over None ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
